Terms of Service

Last Updated: December 2025

Welcome to Heirloom. By using our service, you agree to these terms.

Your Content

You retain full ownership of all content you create and upload to Heirloom. We never claim ownership of your family's stories, recordings, or photos.

Acceptable Use

Heirloom is designed for preserving family memories and stories. You agree to use the service only for its intended purpose and in compliance with all applicable laws.

Service Availability

We strive to maintain high availability of the Heirloom service. However, we may occasionally need to perform maintenance or updates that temporarily affect service availability.

Data Retention

Your content is preserved for as long as you maintain an active account. We believe family memories should last forever, and we're committed to providing long-term storage for your legacy.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at legal@theheirloom.site.

This is a placeholder terms of service. Complete terms will be published before the app launches.
